data.name: Fantasy Mosaics 35: Day at the Museum
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the challenge of Zen mosaic puzzles and explore the museum!

The penguins received an invitation to visit an art exhibition.

While exploring the museum art, they noticed weird footsteps on the floor!

Let's help them investigate what is going on and enjoy the

new collection of colorful mosaic puzzles! Enjoy fun mini games and face the challenge

of the Zen Mode!

- Explore the Zen game mode

- Discover fun mini games

- Gameplay featuring secret colors

- Puzzles based on logic

data.short_description: Enjoy the challenge of Zen mosaic puzzles, explore the museum and discover fun mini games! The gameplay features secret colors. All puzzles are based on logic.
